descriptor.name: Ace Supreme 7.5 Kg 5 Star Semi Automatic Washing Machine - Grey Dazzle
descriptor.short_desc:
Sort-StackCarry station
 Multi Utility Tray
 In built Scrubber
 Max Dry Mode
 420W motor
 Rat Protection
 4 wheels for easy maneuvering
descriptor.long_desc:
25 MINS SOAK TIME - Easy removal of tough dirt with continuous soaking and scrubbing action for 25 minutes.
 
  SOAK TECHNOLOGY - Soaking laundry in concentrated detergent solution helps loosen dirt which makes it easier to remove the stains and dirt from the clothes during wash cycle.
 
  IN BUILT COLLAR SCRUBBER - The In-built Collar Scrubber which ensures that the collars get a good scrubbing every time.
 
  3 WASH PROGRAMS - DELICATE NORMAL HEAVY - The machine has 3 different wash programs(Delicate, normal, heavy ) ensuring a safe and customized wash for every fabric type.
 
  MAX DRY - The machine is equipped with a dry timer that gives superior drying results.
 
  RUST PROOF BODY - Washing Machines are built to last long and have a plastic body which is non-corrosive and rust proof.
 
  4 WHEELS - Fitted with a big wheels so that you can easily move the machine around making it more robust and stable.
 
  EASY MOBILITY - Equipped with 4 wheels, the machine can be moved around by sliding it with ease.
 
  SPIN SHOWER - Spin Shower Facility in washing machine helps reduce detergent residue and soap particles from the clothes.
 
  END OF CYCLE BUZZER - This washing machine is equipped with an end of cycle buzzer to inform the user about the wash cycle completion. This feature helps a user to prevent leaving the wet clothes in the washing machine which cause smell in your laundry.
 
  MEMORY RETENTION - In case of power cut-off, the wash cycle resumes from where it was stopped.
 
  5 YEARS WARRANTY - Get complete peace of mind with 5 year warranty on the wash motor and the prime mover of this washing machine.
 
  IN THE BOX CONTENTS - 1 unit washing machine, 1 unit spin cap, 1 unit drain pipe, 1 unit user manual
 
  WARRANTY - 4 Years on Comprehensive & 5 years on Motor
 
  CONTACT US - Email: helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com | Toll Free: 1800 208 1800
 
 FREE DELIVERY AND EXPRESS INSTALLATION
 
 REPLACMENT POLICY - Any request for replacement of a Product that was damaged at the time of Delivery should be made within 5 days of Delivery. Product will be replaced by the Seller as per Brandâ€™s replacment policy.
